summary: Completed comprehensive testing of RAGineer LLM-Powered QA Assistant. Backend APIs mostly functional with critical LLM integration issues. Frontend fully functional with excellent UI/UX.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 500 error due to OpenAI API connection failure when creating embeddings
critical_bugs.impact: Blocks document upload and indexing functionality
critical_bugs.error_details: openai.APIConnectionError: Connection error when trying to create embeddings via Emergent LLM endpoint

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 500 error due to OpenAI API connection failure when searching vector store
critical_bugs.impact: Blocks core chat/QA functionality - users cannot ask questions
critical_bugs.error_details: Same OpenAI API connection error when vector store tries to search for relevant documents

working_endpoints.status: Working correctly for new user creation

passed_tests: Frontend login page renders correctly with industrial theme
Admin login works with provided credentials (admin@ragineer.com/admin123)
Navigation between Chat, Documents, Admin pages works perfectly
Document upload modal opens and form fields are functional
Admin page shows user management interface with 3 users
Chat interface renders with proper styling and input fields
New chat button clears input correctly
RBAC permissions working (viewer cannot upload documents)
User registration and role assignment working
Statistics endpoint returns proper data structure
All basic CRUD operations for users working
Authentication flow and JWT tokens working properly
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix OpenAI API connection issue in vector store. The Emergent LLM integration is failing with connection errors, blocking both document upload and chat functionality. Check network connectivity to https://llm.emergentagi.com/v1 or verify API key configuration.

success_percentage.backend: 89.5% (17/19 tests passed - 2 critical LLM integration failures)
success_percentage.frontend: 100% (All UI elements, navigation, and forms working perfectly)
